D3 canvas API

GiottoJS injects the canvas namespace into into d3. Importantly, this part of the library is completely independent from the other GiottoJS components and could be stripped out to work on its own.

Line

# d3.canvas.line()

Constructs a new line generator with the default d3 x- and y-accessor functions (that assume the input data is a two-element array of numbers; see below for details), and linear interpolation. The returned function generates path data for an open piecewise linear curve, or polyline, as in a line chart:

Axis

# d3.canvas.axis()

Create a new default axis.
